mapper.select:
SELECT GW_SERVICE_ID AS gwServiceId ,GW_MAIN_ID AS gwMainId ,GW_MAIL_CHK AS gwMailServiceChk ,GW_MAIL_BIGO AS gwMailServiceBigo ,GW_APPROVE_CHK AS gwApproveServiceChk ,GW_APPROVE_BIGO AS gwApproveServiceBigo ,GW_BACKUP_CHK AS gwBackupServiceChk ,GW_BACKUP_BIGO AS gwBackupServiceBigo
FROM GW_DAILY_SERVICE WHERE GW_MAIN_ID =#{gwMainId}

SELECT GW_SERVER_ID AS gwServerId , GW_MAIN_ID AS gwMainId , NODE1_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS node1CpuUsageChk , NODE1_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS node1CpuUsageBigo , NODE1_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS node1MemUsageChk , NODE1_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS node1MemUsageBigo , NODE1_OVERLOAD_CHK AS node1OverLoadChk , NODE1_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS node1OverLoadBigo , NODE1_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS node1DiskUsageChk , NODE1_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS node1DiskUsageBigo , NODE1_PROCESS_CHK AS node1ProcessChk , NODE1_PROCESS_BIGO AS node1ProcessBigo , NODE1_KUB_CHK AS node1KubChk , NODE1_KUB_BIGO AS node1KubBigo , NODE2_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS node2CpuUsageChk , NODE2_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS node2CpuUsageBigo , NODE2_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS node2MemUsageChk , NODE2_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS node2MemUsageBigo , NODE2_OVERLOAD_CHK AS node2OverLoadChk , NODE2_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS node2OverLoadBigo , NODE2_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS node2DiskUsageChk , NODE2_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS node2DiskUsageBigo , NODE2_PROCESS_CHK AS node2ProcessChk , NODE2_PROCESS_BIGO AS node2ProcessBigo , NODE2_KUB_CHK AS node2KubChk , NODE2_KUB_BIGO AS node2KubBigo , NODE3_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS node3CpuUsageChk , NODE3_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS node3CpuUsageBigo , NODE3_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS node3MemUsageChk , NODE3_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS node3MemUsageBigo , NODE3_OVERLOAD_CHK AS node3OverLoadChk , NODE3_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS node3OverLoadBigo , NODE3_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS node3DiskUsageChk , NODE3_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS node3DiskUSageBigo , NODE3_PROCESS_CHK AS node3ProcessChk , NODE3_PROCESS_BIGO AS node3ProcessBigo , NODE3_KUB_CHK AS node3KubChk , NODE3_KUB_BIGO AS node3KubBigo , NODE4_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS node4CpuUsageChk , NODE4_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS node4CpuUsageBigo , NODE4_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS node4MemUsageChk , NODE4_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS node4MemUsageBigo , NODE4_OVERLOAD_CHK AS node4OverLoadChk , NODE4_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS node4OverLoadBigo , NODE4_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS node4DiskUsageChk , NODE4_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS node4DiskUsageBigo , NODE4_PROCESS_CHK AS node4ProcessChk , NODE4_PROCESS_BIGO AS node4ProcessBigo , NODE4_KUB_CHK AS node4KubChk , NODE4_KUB_BIGO AS node4KubBigo , DEVNODE_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS devNodeCpuUsageChk , DEVNODE_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS devNodeCpuUsageBigo , DEVNODE_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS devNodeMemUsageChk , DEVNODE_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS devNodeMemUsageBigo , DEVNODE_OVERLOAD_CHK AS devNodeOverLoadChk , DEVNODE_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS devNodeOverLoadBigo , DEVNODE_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS devNodeDiskUsageChk , DEVNODE_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS devNodeDiskUsageBigo , DEVNODE_PROCESS_CHK AS devNodeProcessChk , DEVNODE_PROCESS_BIGO AS devNodeProcessBigo , DEVNODE_KUB_CHK AS devNodeKubChk , DEVNODE_KUB_BIGO AS devNodeKubBigo , ARCH_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS archCpuUsageChk , ARCH_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS archCpuUsageBigo , ARCH_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS archMemUsageChk , ARCH_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS archMemUsageBigo , ARCH_SWAPUSAGE_CHK AS archSwapUsageChk , ARCH_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS archSwapUsageBigo , ARCH_OVERLOAD_CHK AS archOverLoadChk , ARCH_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS archOverLoadBigo , ARCH_PROCESS_CHK AS archProcessChk , ARCH_PROCESS_BIGO AS archProcessBigo , BACK_CPUUSAGE_CHK AS backCpuUsageChk , BACK_CPUUSAGE_BIGO AS backCpuUsageBigo , BACK_MEMUSAGE_CHK AS backMemUsageChk , BACK_MEMUSAGE_BIGO AS backMemUsageBigo , BACK_SWAPUSAGE_CHK AS backSwapUsageChk , BACK_SWAPUSAGE_BIGO AS backSwapUsageBigo , BACK_OVERLOAD_CHK AS backOverLoadChk , BACK_OVERLOAD_BIGO AS backOverLoadBigo , BACK_DISKUSAGE_CHK AS backDiskUsageChk , BACK_DISKUSAGE_BIGO AS backDiskUsageBigo , BACK_PROCESS_CHK AS backProcessChk , BACK_PROCESS_BIGO AS backProcessBigo FROM GW_DAILY_SERVER WHERE GW_MAIN_ID = #{gwMainId}
